body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
*  [[MJAVADOC-723]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MJAVADOC-723) - Upgrade Maven Reporting API to 3.1.1/Complete with Maven Reporting Impl 3.2.0 (#158) @pzygielo
* Skip Java 9-14 in reproducible test (#155) @jorsol
* Add Integration Test for reproducible builds (#152) @jorsol
* [[MJAVADOC-719]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MJAVADOC-719) - Update Maven Archiver to 3.6.0 (#150) @jorsol

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump assertj-core from 3.21.0 to 3.23.1 (#143) @dependabot
* Bump spring-webmvc from 4.3.29.RELEASE to 5.2.21.RELEASE in /src/it/projects/MJAVADOC-434_fixcompile (#135) @dependabot
* Bump mockito-core from 4.1.0 to 4.4.0 (#133) @dependabot

## What's Changed
* (doc) Update plugin' configuration parameter (MJAVADOC-475) by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/123
* (doc) Update plugin' configuration parameter (MJAVADOC-475) by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/124
* (doc) Fix spurious Javadoc @param tag by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/125
* use shared gh action/release-drafter by @olamy in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/128
* Bump commons-io from 2.2 to 2.7 in /src/it/projects/MJAVADOC-437/module2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/132
* Bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13.1 in /src/it/projects/MJAVADOC-498_modulepath by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/131
* Bump plexus-archiver from 4.2.6 to 4.2.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/118
* Bump maven-archiver from 3.5.1 to 3.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/117
* [MJAVADOC-714] Upgrade to Maven 3.2.5 by @michael-o in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/134


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/compare/maven-javadoc-plugin-3.3.2...maven-javadoc-plugin-3.4.0

## What's Changed
* [MJAVADOC-530] - Clean up additionalparam documentation by @marschall in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/6
* [MJAVADOC-538] Filter out 'Picked up' by @risdenk in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/11
* [MJAVADOC-546] Allow to generate report in Spanish locale by @belingueres in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/12
* [MJAVADOC-537] Explicitly the batchMode to true by @joshiste in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/7
* fix mailing list url in README by @rgdoliveira in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/13
* [MJAVADOC-544] - Changed behaviour of Javadoc for temporary files encoding (options, argfile, ...) by @michael-st in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/10
* [MJAVADOC-444] add aggregate-no-fork and aggregate-test-no-fork for non-forking versions of aggregate goals. by @busbey in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/2
* Avoid converting separator characters into newline. by @cowwoc in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/19
* [MJAVADOC-577] Fixed typos in User Guide. by @glqdlt in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/20
* Fix typo in additionalDependencies documentation by @britter in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/23
* Add missing `@since` tags to sourceFile[Includes|Excludes] by @britter in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/24
* Added example of --add-modules to aggregate FAQ. by @cowwoc in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/18
* Remove space typo in  markdown by @nrbw in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/29
* [MJAVADOC-620] Do not ignore JARs w/o module info when building classpath by @fwienber in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/35
* [MJAVADOC-626] Add a stale javadoc detection mechanism by @gnodet in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/33
* [MJAVADOC-613] exclude skipped modules from javadoc aggregate by @olamy in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/36
* [MJAVADOC-636] exclude some modules from aggregated javadoc by @olamy in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/37
* [MJAVADOC-639] include requires static from external dependencies for all modules by @olamy in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/38
* [MJAVADOC-638] upgrade Doxia Sitetools to 1.9.2 to remove dependency on Struts by @olamy in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/39
* MJAVADOC-610 by @olamy in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/40
* [MJAVADOC-644] Properly close DirectoryStream by @britter in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/41
* update qdox by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/42
* update doxia by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/43
* update misc apache dependencies by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/44
* [MJAVADOC-614] - "No source files for package" in a directory with accent characters by @AlexisJehan in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/30
* Uses try with resources by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/45
* toURL --> toURI().toURL() by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/46
* [MJAVADOC-617] Normalize module path so that '..' in the path are resolved by @weissreto in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/27
* replace deprecated method scheduled for removal and update archiver by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/47
* (doc) Fix referenced parameter by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/49
* [MJAVADOC-653] fix javadoc; fix code smells by @XenoAmess in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/48
* remove unused commons-io  dependency by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/53
* [MJAVADOC-657] The fix operation duplicates annotations on private methods that have an annotation line between the method body and the javadoc comments. by @XenoAmess in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/52
* add undeclared but used dependency by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/54
* [MJAVADOC-658] The fix operation wrongly delete generic functions's generic-class javadoc if exist, and add it if lack, and will not create it if param part of javadoc be empty by @XenoAmess in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/55
* remove dead code by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/56
* [MJAVADOC-659] changing exception description when using "fix". by @XenoAmess in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/57
* [MJAVADOC-664] - Fix stale javadoc data detection on Windows. by @Syquel in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/63
* Bump maven-invoker from 3.0.1 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/73
* Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 2.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/78
* Bump actions/cache from 2.1.5 to 2.1.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/81
* [MJAVADOC-687] Upgrade Jetty Version to last 9.4.x by @olamy in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/92
* Bump mockito-core from 3.9.0 to 3.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/93
* Bump slf4j-simple from 1.7.30 to 1.7.32 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/94
* Bump mockito-core from 3.12.0 to 4.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/103
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.3.4 to 2.3.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/102
* Bump actions/cache from 2.1.6 to 2.1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/109
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.3.5 to 2.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/107
* Bump qdox from 2.0.0 to 2.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/108
* Bump mockito-core from 4.0.0 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/111
* Bump httpcore from 4.4.14 to 4.4.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/113
* [MJAVADOC-694] Avoid empty warn message from getResolvePathResult by @slawekjaranowski in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/104
* Bump plexus-archiver from 4.2.5 to 4.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/112
* Bump doxia-site-renderer from 1.10 to 1.11.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/116
* [MJAVADOC-705] Upgrade Maven Reporting API to 3.1.0 by @michael-o in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/120

## New Contributors
* @marschall made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/6
* @risdenk made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/11
* @belingueres made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/12
* @joshiste made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/7
* @rgdoliveira made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/13
* @michael-st made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/10
* @busbey made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/2
* @cowwoc made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/19
* @glqdlt made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/20
* @britter made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/23
* @nrbw made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/29
* @fwienber made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/35
* @gnodet made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/33
* @olamy made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/36
* @elharo made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/42
* @AlexisJehan made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/30
* @weissreto made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/27
* @XenoAmess made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/48
* @Syquel made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/63
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/73
* @slawekjaranowski made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/104
* @michael-o made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/pull/120

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/maven-javadoc-plugin/commits/maven-javadoc-plugin-3.3.2
